MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL30 postcode area of Llanrhos, affecting properties in Deganwy Road,  Plas Mariandir and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:55PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:49PM on 31st March 2021.
